attributes.action: give the promised referendum on Europe as agreed.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We the electorate wish to petition the current and future Prime Minister of the United Kingdom for the agreed referendum on Europe. We wish the referendum to take place before any more loss off power and or Sovereignty to the European Union.

rejection.details:
This petition overlaps with several already in existence –
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/Treatyeuro/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
